caption: Attribute Dictionary
description: The Attribute Dictionary defines schema attributes and includes references to the events and objects in which they are used.
name: dictionary

allocated_ips.description: The list of reserved ip addresses.

cluster_uid.description: The unique identifier of a cluster.

host_ip_info.description: Host IP and a pool of reserved ip addresses for it.

k8s_image.caption: Image
k8s_image.description: The image name of the container.

k8s_status.description: The Kubernetes status describes the current state of k8s item.

key.caption: Key Name of a key-value pair

node_uid.description: The unique identifier of a Kubernetes node.

selector_label.description: The selectorLabel format used as K8s labels, selectors, ownerReferences etc.

pod_ip_info.description: Pod IP and a pool of reserved ip addresses for it.
